name: DCR: Drive.Crash.Repeat
description: DCR: Drive.Crash.Repeat is a retro style, ludicrous auto-forward driving game with an amazing twist, and absolutely no brakes! Drive your way through tens of handcrafted levels (to the extent that each level has its own name), across different atmospheric worlds!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
